title: Real-time Seating Arrangement Sync
description: Verify that seating arrangements created by one organizer are synchronized in real-time across all connected clients with correct rendering, zoom, and pan.

steps.description: Log in as an organizer on two different clients.
Navigate to the /seat-builder page on both clients.
On client A, drag and drop tables and chairs to create a seating layout on the infinite canvas.
Verify that the seating layout changes appear in real-time on client B exactly as configured.
Use zoom and pan controls on client A to adjust the view.
Verify that zoom and pan adjustments do not interfere with real-time synchronization and seating arrangement accuracy on client B.
Verify that seating arrangement persists after page refresh on both clients.
Check that saved layout is intact and consistent with previous session.

title: Seating Builder Edge Case: Infinite Canvas Boundaries
description: Test the seating engine's ability to handle extensive seating layouts by dragging and dropping seats beyond typical canvas boundaries.

steps.description: Log in as organizer and navigate to /seat-builder.
Drag tables and chairs continuously towards the edges of the canvas to test infinite canvas limits.
Verify the canvas expands dynamically without rendering or performance issues.
Move elements back towards the center and verify no data loss occurs.
Ensure all seating elements maintain their positions accurately.

title: Complete Vendor Onboarding Flow Success
description: Verify that a new vendor can successfully complete the five-step onboarding process including category selection, business details, location entry, legal document upload, and bank verification.

steps.description: Navigate to supplier registration at /supplier/join.
Select vendor category and proceed.
Fill out business details form with valid data.
Verify form accepts valid data and enables next step.
Enter valid location information.
Check location validation succeeds.
Upload all required legal document files with supported formats.
Verify upload success messages and file preview.
Provide bank details and complete verification step.
Verify bank verification status is successful.
Confirm submission and application completion with success confirmation.

title: Vendor Onboarding Validation Errors
description: Test onboarding flow validation by providing invalid inputs and missing required documents to verify proper error handling.

steps.description: Start vendor onboarding at /supplier/join.
Attempt to proceed without selecting a vendor category.
Verify that appropriate validation error is displayed preventing progression.
Input invalid business details such as invalid email and phone formats.
Check form validation shows correct input error messages.
Attempt to upload unsupported file format for legal documents.
Verify upload is rejected with clear error notification.
Try to proceed without uploading required legal and financial documents.
Confirm system prevents progression and highlights missing uploads.
Provide incomplete or invalid bank details.
Verify bank verification fails with descriptive error.

title: Admin Portal Vendor Approval Workflow
description: Verify that an admin can review vendor applications with document previews, change application statuses (approve/reject), and audit logs are recorded.

steps.description: Log in as admin user and navigate to /admin/vendors.
Select a pending vendor application.
Verify that all submitted documents are displayed in review modals.
Change vendor application status to approved.
Confirm status transition is successful and reflected in list.
Repeat for rejection flow with reason input.
Ensure application is marked as rejected with reason visible.
Navigate to /admin/audit.
Verify audit logs include the status changes with timestamps and admin user identities.

title: Marketplace Service Discovery and Booking
description: Verify event organizers can search for services, view accurate availability, book services with escrow simulations, and see vendor revenue updates.

steps.description: Log in as organizer and navigate to /marketplace.
Perform service search using keywords and filters.
Verify that search results display accurate and relevant services.
View detailed service information including availability.
Confirm availability data matches backend state.
Book a service using escrow payment option and schedule time slots.
Verify booking confirmation is received with escrow simulated hold.
Log in as vendor and check revenue dashboard updates.
Verify the vendor revenue reflects the recent booking.

title: Marketplace Booking with Unavailable Service
description: Test booking attempt for a service that is no longer available or fully booked to validate error handling.

steps.description: Search and select a service with no available slots.
Attempt to book the fully booked service.
Verify that booking is blocked with an appropriate error message indicating unavailability.

title: Ticket Scanner QR Code Check-in Success
description: Verify the QR code based ticket scanner successfully reads valid tickets and registers attendee check-ins preventing duplicates.

steps.description: Navigate to /scanner as event staff.
Scan a valid attendee QR code.
Confirm check-in is registered with attendee details displayed.
Scan the same QR code again.
Verify that duplicate check-in is prevented with a warning or error.
Scan an invalid or expired QR code.
Verify system rejects the code with an appropriate error message.

title: AI Event Copilot Suggestion Accuracy and Application
description: Verify the AI-powered event planning assistant generates relevant suggestions which users can preview and selectively apply with smooth UI interaction.

steps.description: Create or edit an event and access the AI Event Copilot panel.
Trigger the AI analysis by interacting with element having data-testid='ai-check-score'.
Verify that AI generates multiple actionable event planning suggestions.
Preview detailed descriptions of suggested improvements without applying them.
Confirm UI responsiveness and clarity during preview.
Select and apply one or more AI suggestions to the event plan.
Verify the event plan updates accordingly and changes persist.

title: AI Event Copilot No Suggestions Handling
description: Verify system behavior when AI Event Copilot is triggered but no relevant suggestions are generated.

steps.description: Access AI Event Copilot panel on an event with minimal or perfect data.
Trigger analysis using data-testid='ai-check-score'.
Verify that a user-friendly message indicates no suggestions are available.
Confirm UI remains stable without errors or crashes.
